name: Mavericks Agency
tagline: Digital Agency with a focus on UX/UI, development
description:
We create effective websites, online stores, and web platforms
Digital production with strong expertise in online marketing. The synergy between marketing and development is the heart of Mavericks Agency’s philosophy. Fundamental research of the market, competitors, category trends, target audience behavior, is the mandatory foreplay before the development process. At the same time, we stand for aesthetic, UX friendly design and high-quality web development. Such an approach helps us to provide our partners with solutions that work and solve their problems.
